import React, { FC, ReactElement } from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import { MyForm } from "./MyForm"; import { makeStyles, createStyles, Theme } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import * as firebase from 'firebase'; import { FirebaseAppProvider, useFirestoreDocData, useFirestore, SuspenseWithPerf } from 'reactfire'; // components import PageTitle from "../components/PageTitle"; import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'; // constants import { APP_TITLE, PAGE_TITLE_CODE } from '../utils/constants'; import { Button ,TextField} from '@material-ui/core'; // define css-in-js const useStyles = makeStyles((theme: Theme) => createStyles({ root: { flex: 1, display: "flex", flexDirection: "row", justifyContent: "space-between", }, button: { margin: theme.spacing(1), }, }) ); const CodeEditor: FC<{}> = (): ReactElement => { const classes = useStyles(); const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyByf-tlPYeu4KU8LcQB1yvOpkhv4C0ijig", authDomain: "parth-admin.firebaseapp.com", projectId: "parth-admin", storageBucket: "parth-admin.appspot.com", messagingSenderId: "247778178343", appId: "1:247778178343:web:c68d5d1b869c4b4acba502" }; return ( <> {PAGE_TITLE_CODE} | {APP_TITLE}
{ console.log(email, firstName, lastName); }} />
) } export default CodeEditor;
